This page collects a list of apache-related modules which are no longer installable due to the removal of Apache 1.x in Gutsy development cycle.

== UNMETDEPS packages without a direct dependency ==

These packages have unmet dependencies without an immediate replacement. They depend on apache-common and some work could be necessary to make them usable with apache2.

== UNMETDEPS packages with a possible dependency ==

These packages have unmet dependencies, but a replacement could be available. They usually depend on libapache-mod-perl or libapache-request-perl, no longer available, but could be replaced by libapache2-mod-perl2 or libapache2-request-perl.
